oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Postcard of the frozen Cumberland River, 1940 January 26
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Photographic postcard depicting people walking across the frozen Cumberland River at Nashville, Tennessee, January 26, 1940. Several barges and towboats are visible below the Cumberland River Sand Company in East Nashville. Forms part of the Nashville Room Postcard Collection. 1 photographic postcard : col. ; 3.5 x 5.5 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Cumberland River Sand Company (Nashville, Tenn.)
